title: First Time Rider
description:
A Skull Kings MC Novella
All she wanted was a fresh start...Aspen's quiet life in Canyon City is turned on its head when she crosses paths with the Skull Kings MC and its most eligible bachelor, Liam Olsen. He's tattooed, he curses, and he drinks...a lot. But Aspen is done for the moment she looks into his hazel eyes. Jumping on the back of his Harley thrusts her deep into a world of sex, strippers, and the attention of a rival gang. Liam's life is dangerous and exciting, just like him. But Aspen's also had a dangerous past, and with all the sparks flying between herself and the sexy biker, those demons are bound to come back. This is a compilation of the three published Skull Kings MC stories, re-edited as a complete 32,000 word novella.
author: Sage L. Morgan
